title: Drive By Shooting by guess who

replies.body: As a Bard main, this is my dream synergy.

If anything this is a "GOSH DARNDIT BARD!!" moment

This just confirms what everyone already thought. Riot is troll.
{{champion:432}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:429}}
Can confirm.  Am troll.
That's when I spam my mastery emote over my sad deflated Bard corpse ;_;
how do you use the emote?

Heyyyy!  Super late response, sorry :-(

I think the default is CTRL + 6.  I rebind it to Y so I can spam it faster >:)
Assigned it to a side-button on my gaming mouse - maximum spam efficiency.
I bound mine to M for mastery.
A red post PogChamp

y say pogchamp then post the image
y not just image

then i would want to report you for trolling since that was an enemy bard :^)

would be epic though to see allied bard help with this.

well he is one of those "internal playtesters" that tell Riot their balancing is fine ...
